name: part_004
file: tmp_【3D LIVE】「 Outside the Box 」Nanashi Mumei Birthday Celebration 2024 【#MoomsDay3DLIVE】 [gl7CwlEg2ZI]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_004.mov

scenes.description: Fade to black transition between songs.
Nanashi Mumei performing 'memories' by Maki Otsuki.

subtitles.original: 僕らはずっと 晴るを待つ
subtitles.english: We've been waiting for clear skies all along

subtitles.original: 胸を打つ音奏でて
subtitles.english: Playing the beats that strike our hearts

subtitles.original: 僕ら晴る風
subtitles.english: We are the breeze of clear skies

subtitles.original: 音に聞く晴るの風
subtitles.english: The breeze of clear skies we hear in the sound

subtitles.original: さあこの歌よ凪げ
subtitles.english: Now, may this song bring a calm

subtitles.original: 晴れに晴れ 花よ咲け
subtitles.english: Clearing and clearing, let the flowers bloom

subtitles.original: 咲いて晴るのせい
subtitles.english: Bloom, because of the clear skies

subtitles.original: あの雲も越えてゆけ
subtitles.english: Go even beyond those clouds

subtitles.original: 遠くまで 遠くまで
subtitles.english: To somewhere far away, far away

subtitles.original:
memories
Lyrics: 大槻真希 Music: 森純太
subtitles.english:
memories
Lyrics: Maki Otsuki Music: Junta Mori

subtitles.original: 小さな頃には 宝の地図が
subtitles.english: When I was little, a treasure map

subtitles.original: 頭の中に 浮かんでいて
subtitles.english: Would float around in my head

subtitles.original: いつでも探した 奇跡の場所を
subtitles.english: I was always searching for that place of miracles

subtitles.original: 知らない誰かに 負けないように
subtitles.english: So I wouldn't lose to anyone I didn't know

subtitles.original: La la la...
subtitles.english: La la la...

subtitles.original: 今では
subtitles.english: But now

subtitles.original: 埃だらけの毎日
subtitles.english: Every day is covered in dust

subtitles.original: いつの日か 全ての
subtitles.english: One day, I'll just surrender

subtitles.original: 時に身をまかせるだけ
subtitles.english: Myself to the flow of time

subtitles.original: もしも世界が変わるのなら
subtitles.english: If the world were to change

subtitles.original: 何も知らない頃の私に
subtitles.english: Take me back to the time when I didn't know anything

subtitles.original: 連れていって 思い出が
subtitles.english: Take me back so that my memories

subtitles.original: 色あせないように
subtitles.english: Never fade away

subtitles.original: 小さな頃から 歌を歌って
subtitles.english: I've been singing songs since I was little

subtitles.original: 夢見る心 温めてた
subtitles.english: Warming my dreaming heart

subtitles.original: みんなで真似した 秘密のメロディ
subtitles.english: The secret melody we all used to imitate

subtitles.original: 今度は上手に 聞こえるように
subtitles.english: Hoping it'll sound better this time

subtitles.original: La la la...
subtitles.english: La la la...

subtitles.original: 今では
subtitles.english: But now

subtitles.original: ため息ついてばかりで
subtitles.english: I'm doing nothing but sighing

subtitles.original: 誰もまだ 本当の
subtitles.english: And still no one is able

subtitles.original: 夢さえつかめないまま
subtitles.english: To grasp their true dreams

subtitles.original: もしも時代が戻るのなら
subtitles.english: If time were to turn back

subtitles.original: 涙を知った頃の私に
subtitles.english: Take me back to the time when I first learned of tears

subtitles.original: 連れていって せつなさが
subtitles.english: Take me back so that this sadness

subtitles.original: 追いつかないように
subtitles.english: Can't catch up to me

subtitles.original: もしも世界が変わるのなら
subtitles.english: If the world were to change

subtitles.original: 何も知らない頃の私に
subtitles.english: Take me back to the time when I didn't know anything

subtitles.original: 連れていって 思い出が
subtitles.english: Take me back so that my memories

subtitles.original: 色あせないように
subtitles.english: Never fade away

subtitles.original: 連れていって せつなさが
subtitles.english: Take me back so that this sadness

subtitles.original: 追いつかないように
subtitles.english: Can't catch up to me
